title: Shaking Wear
summary: Tighten your watchband and shake your wrist like crazy in the 10 secs challenge!
developerAddress: FLAT C, 8/F, TOWER 1, AQUA MARINE, 8 SHAM SHING ROAD, CHEUNG SHA WAN, KOWLOON, HONG KONG
description: The first 'Android Wear' style game:  no more awkward tappings/swipings on the tiny watch screen, all you need is simply SHAKE IT.Exercise your muscle by shaking, and improve your agility for real!Challenge your friends or people over the world to be the TOP SHAKER!Let others know about your amazing power via social network.--------------NOTEThis game is exclusive for Android Wear smart watch, you can't play it without an Android Wear device.--------------HOW TO PLAY- Start "shaking wear" from your phone.- Press the play button (the triangle at bottom left), the game will also be launched at you watch.- Shake your wrist whenever you are ready, the game starts when the first shake is detected.- Shake as fast as you can in the next 10 seconds, and be amazed by your power:-)--------------PERMISSIONS- Access external storage: used to save game screenshot and share it to social network.- Prevent phone from sleeping: so that the game won't be terminated while you are playing.- Control vibration: for more fun :-P
descriptionHTML:
The first 'Android Wear' style game: no more awkward tappings/swipings on the tiny watch screen, all you need is simply SHAKE IT.
Exercise your muscle by shaking, and improve your agility for real!
Challenge your friends or people over the world to be the TOP SHAKER!
Let others know about your amazing power via social network.
--------------
NOTE
This game is exclusive for Android Wear smart watch, you can't play it without an Android Wear device.
--------------
HOW TO PLAY
- Start "shaking wear" from your phone.
- Press the play button (the triangle at bottom left), the game will also be launched at you watch.
- Shake your wrist whenever you are ready, the game starts when the first shake is detected.
- Shake as fast as you can in the next 10 seconds, and be amazed by your power:-)
--------------
PERMISSIONS
- Access external storage: used to save game screenshot and share it to social network.
- Prevent phone from sleeping: so that the game won't be terminated while you are playing.
- Control vibration: for more fun :-P
comments: Inappropriate So I decided to show off the game to a friend and well... He saw something different... It can look very inappropriate to going back and forth with a fist... Yea... Don't try this in public..
